entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `FrozenDictionary<,>` doesn't include the key in `KeyNotFoundException` #98588
  • Exception rethrows in .net 8.0.2 rethrow wrong exception in nested catch blocks with an await in outer catch block #98585
  • FileSystemInfo File.ResolveLinkTarget(path, false) returns incorrect result for non-existent file #98584
  • JIT should fold repeated bounds checks for readonly access #98583
    Future
  • More nativeaot constrained call bug(s) #98582
  • NativeAOT constrained call bug #98581
  • [wasm] System.Text.Json.Tests running out of memory #98578
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter implementation of CALL_HANDLER is incorrect #98577
  • FileNotFoundExceptions caused by Windows Update installing updates for .NET #98576
  • Debugging issues stepping from C++ into Native AOT C# #98575
    Future
  • PAL tests broken again after another PAL refactoring #98574
    9.0.0
  • `TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById(String)` method returns a `TimeZoneInfo` object that is reference equal of the provided `TimeZoneInfo` #98571
    Future
  • WriteAllLinesAsync can throw IOException synchronously somehow #98564
    9.0.0
  • Possible DependencyInjection service scope validation regression, blocking dependency flow into dotnet/aspnetcore #98551
  • System.Data.Odbc - Connection Object Not Closed When DataReader Object is Disposed/Closed Upon Command Execution #98549
  • `CultureNotFoundException` thrown when a keyboard with language tag `und` is activated #98543
    Future
  • Package Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection 8.0.0 is not compatible with net80-android #98541
  • [ILLink] Linker relies on recursive interfaceImpls to be applied by Roslyn #98536
  • Issues with reflection where the return type of GetMember is an empty array of MemberInfo #98533

Closed

  • Build Failure on MacOS ARM64 Rid issue with sqlite #90434
    9.0.0
  • Improve error reporting for dynamic method invocation via reflection #97022
    9.0.0
  • Analyzer: Detect the problem of using a System.Type overload instead of the generic overload #68243
    Future
  • ValidateOnStart() does not work in Azure Function #96034
    8.0.x
  • Attempt to use of dynamically created type in the attribute leads to exception #95829
    9.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Multiple library tests report icall_wrapper_mono_generic_class_init failure #96050
  • [Perf][Mono] Linux/arm64 Regressions due to rewritten of Matrix3x2 and Matrix4x4 #80570
    9.0.0
  • [mono][docs] Change build/run individual runtime test example #90254
    Future
  • All build legs need to move off macOS 10.15 #75292
    6.0.x
  • Add support to AzDO and Support testing changes in mirror #47328
    6.0.x
  • runtime-staging (i.e. iOS and tvOS) legs are timing out in PRs #58549
    Future
  • NRE in `iOS.Device.Aot.Test` when starting up xharness #96403

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify BigInteger.Multiply #98587
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Support storing Swift error register value to SwiftError struct #98586
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Stop reporting FP locals as being on the x87 stack for 32-bit platforms #98580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add additional hash algorithms for X.509 SKI calculation #98579
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update RapidJSON #98573
    area-Host
  • Revert "Don't use IEnumerable and yield return for GetDefaultInterfac… #98572
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable new exception handling by default #98570
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove more ZapDisable/ZapRequire references #98569
    needs-area-label
  • [browser][MT] JSType.OneWay fire and forget #98567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Refactor the generic TensorPrimitives implementation into multiple files. #98566
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • [no merge] Draft: infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Use successor edges instead of block targets for BBJ_EHFINALLYRET #98563
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing type name parsing test coverage #98562
    area-System.Reflection
  • Prevent incorrect constant folding of binary operations involving handle and integer #98561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete type_traits.h #98553
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix NativeAOT publish failure on fi_FI culture #98552
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix error message for byref of byref TypeLoadException #98548
    area-System.Reflection
  • [NativeAOT] Add null checks into memcpy/memset helpers #98547
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Check for EnC in profiler ReJIT #98546
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add test case for interfaces without impls for whole hierarchy #98540
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update diasymreader to 17.8.7-beta1.24113.1 #98539
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, needs-area-label, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] clean up js argument parsing #98537
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [RISC-V] Set setFrameRequired like the other archs #98535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv

Merged

  • Added more verbose error message when calling method using reflection and target type does not match passed type #98129
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [mono] Intrinsify LoadAndInsertScalar #98532
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Fix msvc warning #98568
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove exclusion for a fixed test #98542
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Refactor Compiler::optRedirectBlock; remove BasicBlock::CopyTarget #98526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HX_3A_B` to `SVE_JL_3A` and `SVE_IC_3A` to `SVE_IC_3A_C` #98332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • suggesting braces around initialization of subobject while building runtime repo #98420
    area-System.Security
  • [mono] Intrinsify multiple StoreVector API's #98514
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Split JSImport/JSExport tests #98557
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Move reflection from C# to C #98534
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add some eventlog APIs to WindowsAPIs.txt #98545
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete suppressions against resolved issues #98512
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Block SIMD types in Swift interop #98429
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Don't strip pointed-to type information in IL stubs #98392
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.PopCount #98281
    area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #98485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Streaming mode for SPMI #98440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HY_3A` to `SVE_IB_3A` #98468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [ILLink] Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add correct ImplementingType and InterfaceImpl to DIM cache in TypeMapInfo #98513
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [wasm] New jiterpreter backbranch scan pass #98530
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] pinvoke improvements part 2 #98250
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][wasi] Throw error when WasmBuildNative is explicitly set to false during a single-file build #98087
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • JIT: Fold more casts #98528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove DAM from design-time attributes #98378
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensuring XUnitLogChecker is included in libraries outerloop #97135
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • XUnitLogChecker: Ensure missing stack frames are resolved on Windows using dotnet-sos #98397
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix analyzer failure where incorrect SemanticModel is used #91764
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][mt] Guard more places for blocking wait on JS interop threads #98508
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Update linux musl arm32 helix image to Alpine 3.17 #98531
    needs-area-label
  • Fix some generic math DIMs to have the correct behavior #98510
    area-System.Numerics
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threading SignalR in Blazor WBT #98343
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Forward the pgoinstrument argument to the inner build for VMR/Source-build builds #98446
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Fix a performance regression introduced by #97096. #98515
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Privately expose MsQuic performance counters #98422
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add some linux-arm test coverage #98022
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V] Remove unnecessary assertion from emitOutputInstr #98484
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Fix Random.Shuffle covariance #98471
    area-System.Runtime
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #98525
    area-Meta
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build Mac symbols in .dSYM bundle, not single .dwarf file #96456
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [riscv64] fix linq MixedScope test #96671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Custom modifiers in reflection #201
  • Incorrect value of DllImportSearchPath passed to NativeLibrary callbacks #206
  • Tls callbacks #1795
  • ran great, then after relaunch of Rider, "Unable to resolve ..." #1833
  • Publishing static library should also publish other necessary static libs #1733
  • NativeAOT - IlcDisableReflection + Process.Start Throws TypeInitialization_Type_NoTypeAvailable #1117
  • Hard to diagnose error in ILC #899
  • Options how library can speify their own RD.xml #882
  • Compile C# to .sys using NativeAOT #767
  • Dataflow analysis leftover work #339
  • COM interop support #306

Updated

  • Review UX and bindings for .NET Swift interop tooling in simple P/Invoke void cases #2518

PullRequests

Updated

  • Implement projection tooling for simple P/Invoke void cases #2517
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Package validator should have a warning for the package which exposes types of its dependency with PrivateAssets="compile" #38853
  • CSC hangs for 20 seconds when run with /shared argument on .NET SDK 8.0.200 #38850

Closed

  • dotnet workload restore doesn't restore required SDKs since 8.0.200 #38769
  • Running dotnet build in Simplified Chinese environment may result in garbled code #35473
  • dotnet-install.sh fails to download dotnet-sdk-8.0.201-linux-x64.tar.gz: BlobNotFound #38819

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #38825
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #38824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #38823
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #38822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #38821
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #38820
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2381276 #38833
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2372344 #38813
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to the Feb 8.0.2 runtime #38812
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding #38792
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branding
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #38734
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #38733
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #38731
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #38732
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #38730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #38729
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use MSBuild CLI in the test framework to get Property/Item data #38811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38814
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged

Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add more incremental docs #72149
  • Very slow build - can't build project #72148
  • Roslyn fails to verify nullable reference types' safety in collection expressions #72142
  • dotnet 8.0.200 breaking change - wrong exception is thrown when rethrow in a catch inside another catch using async methods #72141
  • Restore failed due to Package Source Mapping #72140
  • `RazorSourceGenerator` failed to initialize when building ASP.NET/Razor project in VS 17.10 Preview 1 #72139
  • Razor/Roslyn Cohosting: Use `#line` directives instead of `ISpanMappingService` #72136

Closed

  • Spread Operator with possible null value gives no compile time warning if nullable enabled #72121
  • Incorrect cast-can-be-removed suggestion with lambdas and implicit operators. #72134
  • CSC Crash: This program location is thought to be unreachable. File='/_/src/Compilers/CSharp/Portable/Symbols/FunctionTypeSymbol.cs' Line=144 #72056
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations in AbstractRecommendationServiceBasedCompletionProvider.GetSymbolsAsync #72157
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Strike out obsolete symbols #72156
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Incorporate underlying type's hierarchy into overload resolution #72155
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Remove unused OmniSharp extension method #72154
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153
  • Remove code not used in product #72152
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove at most 1 end of line preceding redundant nullable directives #72150
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • WIP: Remove solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations during check for duplicate analyzers #72144
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Merge Lock object feature to main #72137
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type

Merged

  • Fix crash in designer discovery #72151
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump a few transitively included packages to 8.0 #72092
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Bail out more quickly when doing nav-to searches #72146
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make method abstract and force subclasses to implement #72145
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72107
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Refactor how docs are added/removed in SolutionState #72143
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove legacy unit testing type #72132
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Address more PROTOTYPE comments #72113
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Fix remove-unnecessary-cast with necessary delegate cast #72135
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Always visit conversions in array initializers #72131
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reuse compilation tracker states when possible. #72111
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Defer parsing syntax trees when computing frozen partial solutions #72090
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined conversions #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Support more than one frozen source generated document at once #72115
    Area-IDE
  • Add caching for Regex creation in AnalyzerConfigSet #72114
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Simplify how frozen partial documents are produced. #72106
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #72127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add invariant around nullable conditional state #72072
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, 17.10
  • Include SourceLink file in CoreCompile dependency checks #72109
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Patterns: Expand non-negative sets when performing certain operations #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • QuickGrid sample code for test with Virtualize #54083
  • HttpsRedirectionMiddleware should not redirect requests to the same port #54082
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Support configuring SignalR hub option with Blazor interactive server rendering #54080
  • .NET 8 Blazor WASM Debugging and Hot Reload are very buggy. #54079
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #54078
  • Perf regression: mapaction, mapaction #54077
  • System.IO.IOException: ' Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream.' #54076
  • httpContext.SignInAsync not working after update to .NET 8.0.2 #54075
  • Customizability Identity Endpoints #54073
  • Option to serve WebAssembly app with multithreading #54071
  • Allow to check the maximum size of the SignalR message on the client side #54068
  • Using fallback authorization policy breaks Blazor Server after migrating to .NET 8 #54066
  • Asp.Net Core attribute validation does not work on polymorphic properties #54070
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #54065

Closed

  • kgfr #54074
  • npm publishing is broken #54012
  • InputSelect not selecting the binded value as expected #53988
  • Perf regression: json #54014
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54027
  • [Blazor WASM] Upgrading project to .NET 8 and breaks [Authorize] Attribute #53075

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable unified build #54084
    area-infrastructure
  • Infrastructure tweaks for unified build #54081
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b75ecf1` to `5df0241` #54069
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [Infrastructure] Avoid building node JS assets multiple times #54072
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • [Infrastructure] Fix NPM packaging #54056
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Add option to serve WebAssembly app with multithreading #54062
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-trace should not default to all keywords and verbose #4511
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Change provider defaults for dotnet-trace #4512
    dotnet-trace, 9.0.0
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #4515

Updated

  • Validate format options in dotnet-trace convert #4514

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • warning MA002 is raised claiming that packages are not automatically included, yet packages *are* automatically included - leading to making it impossible to add a direct reference to an implicit package through tooling #20658
  • aot-runtime.c:1579, condition `data' not met #20657
  • [iOS] Improve the CollectionView FindEstimatedSizeUsingWidth to handle grouping and testing #20654
    Backlog
  • Error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'MauiUIApplicationDelegate' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?) (CS0246) #20649
  • Add more tests for Images on buttons #20648
  • Connectivity.Current.ConnectivityChanged += Connectivity_ConnectivityChanged; event is not raised #20645
  • [iOs - Publish] iOs Publishing fails with codesign execution finished (exit code = 1). #20640
  • [BUG] Windows Shell Flyout Navigation fails to navigate to same page after navigating back from it #20635
  • Warning `XC0022` if using `FormattedText` from a `Label` #20633
  • [iOS] UIScrollView Custom Handler's Zoom View changes position after resuming from OnSleep state #20632
  • [iOS] Editor does not scroll when cursor goes behind keyboard #20631

Closed

  • [Android] Modal Pages do not fill screen when in Fullscreen #10364
    Backlog
  • Support compiled bindings for generic ViewModels #20616
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Page.Width = -1 in Page_Loaded() in Mac Catalyst Maui #10763
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Text color is not set if the button has a style #20643
  • Error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'MauiUIApplicationDelegate' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?) #20638
  • [Enhancement] Add different input types for prompt #9913
    Backlog
  • Touch input doesn't work in MAUI.Blazor #20377
  • ImageButton is not properly anti-aliased when scaled down #16918
    Under Consideration
  • KNOWN ISSUE: .NET SDK 8.0.200 Installs the Incorrect MAUI Workload Versions #20600
  • [Bug] Animated GIF files do not play on iOS/macOS #866
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Compile Error: "The type or namespace name 'MauiUIApplicationDelegate' could not be found" in latest nightly builds #20099
  • error CS0234: The type or namespace name 'Compatibility' does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Platform' #20565
  • The type or namespace name 'MauiUIApplicationDelegate' could not be found Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.Maui 8.0.7 #20591
  • Error in xamarin.kotlin.stdlib ($ReflectSdkVersion is defined multiple times) after migration from Xamarin.Forms #14954
  • Hot Reload not working on Tutorial #20636

PullRequests

Created

  • Change activity attributes #20653
  • [Android Connectivity] Set app package on Intent used to invoke context receiver for network callback #20651
  • [Testing] Added categories to Controls.AppiumTests #20642
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [net9.0] Enable unit tests back #20639
  • [C] Parent Background Brush to propagate changes #20637

Merged

  • Fix modal page push in immersive mode #19903
    community ✨, area/modal
  • [net9.0] Bring latest main fixes to net9.0 #20652
  • [XC] Allow generic types in x:DataType and x:Type #20625
  • Update Issue16918.cs to latest Appium code #20650
  • [ci] Remove Agent.OSVersion from demands #20641
  • Add new Keyboards for Prompt #20194
    t/enhancement ☀️, do-not-merge, community ✨, area/keyboard
  • (Windows) ImageButton contents now explicitly stretches #17159
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-button, stale, Under Consideration
  • Add animated GIF support for Image on iOS #19411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 SR3
  • Only run delete if files exist #20617

Updated

  • Picker ItemsSource fixes #19728

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support for expressions when configuring composite keys #33114
  • Error: Script-Migration -Idempotent -Context "MyDbContext" -StartupProject "MyStartupProject" -Project "MyDataProject" #33113
  • Can I make migration bundle to behave as if IncludeAllContentForSelfExtract is set? #33112

Closed

  • Latest news and progress on .NET 8 and EF8 #29989
    Discussions
  • Assertion failure in SQLite following Blob column PR #32944
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite issue with multiple Blob colums #32747
    9.0.0
  • How to get Point-Read with EF Core 6.0 & CosmosDB, Find & FindAsync methods #27679
  • SqlServer FillFactor for PK is missing #32803
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #33046 - ArgumentException thrown when building queries involving owned entities mapped with .ToJson() #33110

Merged

  • New PR: Microsoft.Data.Sqlite issue with multiple Blob colums (Issue #32747) and following Assertion failure in SQLite following Blob column PR (Issue #32944) #33111
  • Add fill factor to keys and unique constraints #32900
    community-contribution

Updated

  • 32943-Sugar for HierarchyId path generation #33062
  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #32721

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-install.sh fails with "The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found" #18702

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #18709
  • Store repo build exit code #18708
  • Exclude format/watch from SDK diff #18707
  • Update SDK diff baseline #18706

Merged

  • Update MAUI manifests from .NET 9 Preview 1 #18693
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #18681
  • Add linux-arm native AOT support #18703
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #18682
  • Update branding again and downgrade implicit version #18680
    Branding

Updated

  • Isolate package flow between repos #18557
  • Improve/fix cross-build support. #18658
  • Remove aspire exclusion #18663
  • Enable installer and SDK repos in VMR build #18632
  • Add PackageDiff tool and task #18580
  • Installer updates (Merge to SDK Changeset) #17959
